pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Anti-Fungal Gel 20g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Anti-Fungal Gel relieves symptoms of Candida skin infections, athlete's foot, ringworm and jock itch.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Anti-Fungal Gel relieves symptoms and irritation associated with many fungal skin infections such as athlete's foot, jock itch, ringworm and candida skin infections.

Product Claims: Product not tested on animals.

Size: 20g

KEY FEATURES

• Relieves symptoms of Candida skin infections, athlete's foot, ringworm and jock itch

Warnings

If irritation develops, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. If symptoms persist, consult your Healthcare Professional. Skin patch test prior to use. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Do not use if safety seal at mouth of tube is punctured. Contains Alcohol.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Melaleuca Oil 50mg/g

Directions

For external use only. To open, reverse cap and push firmly into neck of tube to fully puncture safety seal. Apply to affected areas three times daily. Once applied, allow the preparation to dry before dressing or enclosing affected areas. It is important to continue treating affected areas for two to three weeks after symptoms cease. Use only as directed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
